About

Sophie's Unique AI covers all economical actors from individuals to big financial institutions. But especially Sophie's financial models and platform technologies best fits for SME's and individuals looking for smart money.Micro, Small, Medium Enterprises. Typical Financial Institutions are not smart, agile and only focuses what you have already. On the other hand Sophie understands entities' distinctive social-economical position in their trust network.

BETTER FINANCIAL SERVICES

World Needs a better banking system. Many Individuals and SME’s can not Access to decent Financial Services, Core of the Problem is the Old Banking Mindset Itself. Banks are not built to serve you better, they already suffer from creating value from simple assets.

NEW FORM OF BANKING

Sophie platform is about making banking more accessible to masses, acknowledges access to financing is key to growth and human flourishing. Wishes to remove outdated banks out of the way of banking as a service.

CREDIT GAP

The Credit GAP for Micro, Small, Medium-Size Enterprises in the Developing World is $2.1 trillion to $2.5 trillion Of the Estimated 365 million to 445 million formal/informal SME's, %70 do not use external financing although they are in need of it.

1 Understands

Sophie understands with a state of art rating and scoring system looking to your financial past with a different perspective while predicting the future with machine learning.

2 Active and Agile

Sophie is Active and Agile. Forget about paperwork, Sophie does not need anything more than what you paid for to whom.

3 Learns

Sophie's deep-learning mechanism can predict the financial behavior of actors recognizing them as a part of a whole network of business network.

4 Shares & Cares

Sophie is a goal oriented financial distribution platform which can focus increase the eco-friendly enterprises or encourage energy savings via smart contracts.

Why We Need a New BANKING System?

Bill Gates

We need banking but we don’t need banks anymore.

Mark Twain

A banker is a fellow who lends you his umbrella when the sun is shining, but wants it back the minute it begins to rain.

Muhammad Yunus

Microcredit has shown how you can reach out to people that conventional banking cannot. It has demonstrated that it’s a doable proposition.

Lucy Powell

There’s a loss of faith in the banking system that for so long has been the backbone of prosperity and growth.

SOPHIE

as a Governed Financial Services Delivery Platform

DISTRIBUTION CHAIN

 

Growth by relation/referring mechanism decreases operational efforts for tracking, scoring, data gathering and governance.

FRAUD RESILIENCE

 

Sophie creates resilience against money laundry and fraud by forming up a highly-non-cash funding mechanism and trusted chain.

FINANCIAL CRIME AWARENESS

 

Sophie’s centralized flow control, data processing, and single integration point for case management systems enables an holistic view for monitoring.

RISK MITIGATION & SUSTAINABILITY

Sophie controls the velocity of financing and reconstructs collection depending on transaction flow itself resulting a low risk and sustainable revenue.

GOAL ORIENTED FINANCING

Sophie’s AI drives the fastest and highest revenue cycle by default, however the system can empower other data driven behaviors such as funding low-foot-print SMEs in an agriculture chain.

 

LEGALIZATION ENCOURAGEMENT

Platform encourages legalization by rewarding SMEs as they expose their trust chain and business data with additional revenue streams enable to them similar to a financial service delivery hub.
